cnbc.summary: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella told employees on Thursday that the company has work to do to smooth relations with employees after layoffs.

cnbc.summary: One analyst fretted that much of Oracle's planned business expansion comes from a single client: OpenAI.

cnbc.summary: United CEO Scott Kirby said that the discount airline model is over.

cnbc.summary: Kirk, a close ally of President Donald Trump, was killed by a gunman during a political event at Utah Valley University in Orem.

cnbc.summary: Trump wants the Fed to slash rates in order to spur economic growth and reduce the cost of paying the nation's debts.

cnbc.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent met this week with Warsh, Lindsey and Bullard as Fed chief search continues

cnbc.title: Here's what Paramount Skydance would be buying in a deal for Warner Bros. Discovery
cnbc.summary: Paramount Skydance CEO and Chairman David Ellison could buy Warner Bros. Discovery and add major TV and film franchises as well as sports rights to his empire.

cnbc.title: Most of Elon Musk’s fortune now comes from his private companies
cnbc.summary: Together, Musk's stake in xAI and SpaceX are now worth nearly twice as much as his Tesla shares.

cnbc.summary: Adobe shares have dropped this year, badly underperforming the broader market.
